item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Deep hole where there used to be a grassy verge, 21st August
item.description:
There used to be some kind of grassy mound outside the row of houses, and over time it has eroded away and it now presents a fairly deep hole. This causes issues for people coming off the drive but also has caused an issue for people walking along the street with prams or elderly as the hole is fairly deep.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on sign next to bridge, 21st August
item.description:

item.title: Wheelie bins overflowing with litter, 21st August
item.description:
Hi! There are two overflowing wheelie bins on the pavement at westerly Cresent opposite the station and Lewisham bowling club. The overflowing litter from the bins has been there for a few weeks now, can the bins be removed please? Thanks
